body: Set theory (sets): ordinal analysis, admissible sets and Î±-recursion
Large cardinals (lcas): inner model theory and iterated forcing
Other math (rec): descriptive set theory, non-generalized recursion theory and type theory
Programming (cs): operating systems, compilers and cybersecurity; C and Rust
Music: synthwave/chillwave (HOME, Chris Doerksen), psychedelic (Tame Impala), electro swing, jungle and phonk
We Know The Devil (wktd): a visual novel we highly commend
